name: Improvised
description:
This weapon’s selling cost is 0G.
All attributes on this weapon are always enabled, but each time this weapon is used, there’s a 30% chance that it will lose the most expensive attribute not already selected to be lost after the battle. This attribute is always lost last. If two or more other attributes are tied you may choose which one(s) are lost.

Cannot be purchased.
comment: Items in modifers should be integers
